summary: Replaces the first two \"Matronly\" hair styles for Elves with two types of ponytails.
descriptionHtml:
Elven Ponytails!

Bow strings getting in your hair? Men making fun of your old woman hair-do? Tie that back, girl! 

This replaces several of the Dark Elf hair \"matronly\" hair styles with two ponyails, a long one, and a high one, both taken from Female Humans\' selections. This works on all Elves! Enjoy!

Addendum: 
Pictured mods include Xenius\' excellent female skin detail mods, as well as my own \"Goblin Eyes Begone\" For Wood Elves.

To install: Drag and drop \"meshes\" folder into your Data directory, check \"Load Loose Files\" on the Data Files section of the Skyrim Launcher before launching the game, pick a Elf, enjoy.

To uninstall: Simply delete the hair.nif and .tri files from the hair directory under meshes/actors/character/.

Credits
All meshes copyright Bethesda Softworks, simply moved and replaced.
author: Natalie73
